title: Can there be an "opt out" option in ranked? (Hear me out)
body:
We have all experienced that moment in ranked where one person decides to go heimerdinger jungle without smite, or is last pick and refuses to communicate, except when its their turn to pick and they say "but i dont have any supp champs, ill just go zed supp" and the whole team in that moment knows that the game is lost, in the last lobby i was in, our last pick decided to go supp fiora with no exhaust, and two other members of the team said that they were in the last game with that player and that that player trolled all game, so one brave soul said "I'm probably going to dodge" and the whole team (me included) felt relieved. 
i know that dodging is bad and i personally don't do it myself, but in this case that one guy saved us all from losing 20LP at cost to himself, 
so why doth we try and implement an 'opt out' vote so that if you get someone who refuses to communicate or trolls or "doesnt have supp champs" if everyone else in the team votes to opt out, it disbands the lobby.

the only problem with this is that people would opt out when the enemy team comp is better, i dont know how this could be avoided but there must be a way, maybe if the enemy team could somehow be included in the vote as well (they will probably just not vote because they want to win, but there are some people who do actually do want fair games, so its at least a hope)

replies.body: yes coz 20 minute queues would be amazing

Its a team majority vote that he is asking for, He isn't saying get rid of time penalty but have an option there for when you have a "troll", perhaps they could instead have an opt-out for the whole team, but something like a kick that gives a reduced penalty to the person "trolling" that way it would perhaps stop players from wanting to be "trolls". I think its a good idea anyways long queues are nothing of an issue.{{champion:1}} {{champion:25}} {{summoner:7}}

I think he means that we learned from experience.

Time penalties on queue dodging, as crazy as it might sound, are NOT something Riot made. They are a community request.
They have been demanded loudly and repeatedly because, when ranked was introduced, queue dodging made mid-high levels *unplayable*, with around 60-80 minutes queue before finding a game where nobody left.
I don't see it coming back to free leaves anytime soon.

(as for LP penalties, they're meaningless anyways, but they do appeal to certain groups of players)
its not exactly a free leave, you need 9 people to all vote to opt out for the lobby to disband
So what your saying is, this system would never work, because never would the enemy team vote for it if you have a troll anyway.

Why is it that whenever this topic gets suggested, they never consider the fact that it's only ever going to be manipulated.

Dodging can NEVER be freely allowed, neither can be voting for a person to dodge because they "aren't co-operating"

I think it can. 
The way that this would work would be similar to ARAM, tokens. 

You can only have a maximum of two or just one dodge token. You earn a dodge token by playing 7-13 full non DC or AFK warned match. Doesn't matter id you win or lose those matches.

So in other words, if you get trolls several matches in a row your fucked.

Meaning there would be no point to the system you just suggested.

If you have trolls every single game then yes you're fucked. 
The point of the system I fabricated was to alleviate or dampen the possible constant dodging with the OP's scenario as well as giving honest players a chance to dodge without negative repercussions. 
It's not meant to get you out of every possible shitty team comp or troll champ select. It is to give players a chance to rematchmake for one or two games a time. 
It is not meant to solve the problem of trolls being trolls, only to give the player a way of dealing/avoiding the situation, even if it's only for one or two matches at a time (useful when you're doing promotions). 
The numbers I mentioned above are simply variables. Open to adjustment.
Above all it's a common ideology that it's the player's job to get out of troll-o-queue. 

**"If you're a better player than the troll going 0/20/0 at 20 minutes then you should be climbing MMR and rank."**
In reality it would just promote dodging on a regular basis regardless of trolls or not based on things that don't need to be dodged over.
Riot pls implement dis!!
